column5: Thought I'd share last night's ride back to the boat ramp. Get out now and often...winter will be here quicker than we think!
Great picture!      You are so right...enjoy it while you can!
nice photo   I like winter     but lets Not think about it for a few more months
Yup, we lost an hour of fishing per day over the last while, but the sunsets on the water are stunning this time of year. Great Pic  Paul
now till Nov is my fav. time of year!  the kids go to bed when it's getting dark and that means I get more time on the water and off the dock!     I'm soooo looking forward to this weekend.
love winter...bring on the ice...but we still have fall walleye fishing before....win win situation.  Nice picture though.
